sourcesContent:
import React, { FC, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../../styles/ShoppingCart/ShoppingCart.css' interface ShoppingCartProps { windowWidth: number, setShoppingCart: Function, shoppingCart: any } const ShoppingCart: FC = ({ windowWidth, setShoppingCart, shoppingCart }) => { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false) const [modalIndex, setModalIndex] = useState(null); const handleRemoveModalOpen = (indexId: number) => { setModalIndex(indexId) setModalOpen(true) document.body.style.overflowY = 'hidden'; } const handleRemoveModalClose = () => { setModalIndex(null) setModalOpen(false) document.body.style.overflowY = 'auto'; } return (

Shopping Cart

{shoppingCart.map((product: any, index: number) => (

{product.title}

Color: {product.color.toUpperCase()} Size: {product.size} Quantity: {product.productQuantity}
${product.price} SubTotal: ${product.price * product.productQuantity}
{(modalOpen && modalIndex === index) && (
Remove Item

Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?

)}
))}

Order Summary

{shoppingCart.length} Item(s)
Item(s) Subtotal $124.43
Shipping TBD
Subtotal $124.43
Estimated Tax TBD

Order Total

$124.43
) } export default ShoppingCart
